content: good morning. I have a problem to connect to Logical Modeller connecting to http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4/ server image.png . could Anybody have information about this topic?. thanks
Hi @Juan Antonio De los Cobos - when does that error arise? (I did do a reasonable large update last week, so could well have inadvertent side effects...)

image.png when i am trying to check the name of the new logical model, is arising this error. i am using http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4/ server. But in this server is working http://home.clinfhir.com:8054/baseR4/ Thank you David

Yeah - hapi is timing out on the query that is used to check that the model name is unique. @James Agnew ?

In the meantime, feel free to use the clinfhir one - though it pays to periodically download a copy of the SD periodically as a backup if you wish to keep the model (actually, the same applies to the hapi server - no guarantees for a free service!)
